mapper.select: SELECT id, mtmy_user_id, qq, wechat, email, company_name as companyName, area_id, address, create_by, create_date FROM mtmydb.mtmy_user_contact_info where mtmy_user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_user_contact_info( mtmy_user_id, qq, wechat, email, company_name, address, create_by, create_date ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{qq}, #{wechat}, #{email}, #{companyName}, #{address}, #{createBy.name}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_user_contact_info SET qq=#{qq}, wechat=#{wechat}, email=#{email}, company_name=#{companyName}, address=#{address} WHERE mtmy_user_id = #{userId}
